1. Find agendas, minutes, & presentations online and at City Hall.
2. Access the city's boards and commissions, including minutes, agendas, and member information.
3. #### [City Calendar](https://www.fbgtx.org/calendar.aspx)

   View events and activities occurring throughout the city.
4. #### [City Council](https://www.fbgtx.org/84/City-Council)
5. #### [City Holidays](https://www.fbgtx.org/190/City-Holidays)

   View the holidays when the city offices, recycling center, and landfill will be closed.
6. #### [City Manager](https://www.fbgtx.org/66/City-Manager)

   Read the duties and selection guidelines for the city manager.
7. #### [City Secretary](https://www.fbgtx.org/256/City-Secretary)
8. Access ordinances for various departments, divisions, and situations within the city.
9. Read about the Comprehensive Plan Update process and the development of the 2024 Comprehensive Plan and Parks Master Plan.
10. Read the rule charter, adopted in 1991, to learn more about the city government. It was last amended in 2024.
